pr_title: Fix position trasformation for all nodes having metadata

timeline.message: Fix position transformation for all nodes having metadata

timeline.body:
Consider the error msg: 
`invalid documentation: 'Deprecated' documentation is only allowed on constructs annotated as '@deprecated' `

e.g.
```
# Define a type
# # Deprecated *(new warn line)*
# This type is deprecated
public type Foo CONST1|CONST2; *(old warn line)*
```
